::Battera::

She smiled and welcomed the company. "I don't want to go too far from 
the ship.  I was just wanting a little fresh air. Thank you for 
joining me." She walked down the hall and to the entrance. 




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Rex::
> 
> Rex frowns, looking at Battera. Go outside? His mind instantly 
jumped to its 
> ussual conclusion: Predacon threachery. Maybe Battera was just here 
to gather 
> information on the Cybertronian Fire, and then run off back to her 
base... 
> She didn't look the type to do that, but Predacons we ussually not 
what they 
> seemed. In either case, accompanying her would ensure that she 
doesn't give 
> information to the Predacons.
> 
> "Allright. I'll escort you," he says, nodding, "But we can't go too 
far from 
> the ship."
